full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 162 of 228 838 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct knowledge, would Jane go with Mr. Epstein and Ms. Maxwell? MR. PAGLIUCA: Objection. Lack of foundation, your Honor. THE COURT: Sustained. Q. Did you ever see Jane with luggage? A. Yes, I did. Q. After you -- where did you see Jane with luggage? A. She came maybe twice with a small luggage, and they left with Mr. Epstein in their plane. Q. Let me break that down a little bit. Where did you see Jane with luggage on these approximately two occasions? A. I saw her at the house in Palm Beach bringing the luggage. Q. Mr. Epstein's house? A. Mr. Epstein's house. Q. Do you know how Jane got to the airport? A. Yes. I was introduced to be -- I was the driver also. Q. So did you drive Jane to the airport? A. Jane with Mr. Epstein and Ms. Maxwell, Max, the little dog, and other guests. Q. And when you drove them to the airport, did you drive all the way up onto the tarmac? A. All the way up to the plane. Q. Were you able to see Jane get on the plane? A. Yes. Q. And who did she get onto the plane with? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012447
